detail_desc: Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, airy jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a round neck.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Tiered skirts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. One with an all-over print.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Tops in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.

Double-breasted tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin notch lapels, covered buttons at the front, decorative covered buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Chest pocket and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Slightly wider, straight-cut blouse woven in a spot-print cotton blend with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with cuffs.
Metal earrings decorated with a metal pendant in the shape of a unicorn skeleton. Length approx. 6 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline and raglan sleeves.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a padded, pile-lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, an inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
Elastic faux fur scrunchies.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Fitted vest top in stretch ribbed viscose jersey.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Short, smocked dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and overlocked edges. Unlined.

Set with a dungaree dress in a stretch weave and top in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a front pocket, adjustable straps with press-studs and a concealed press-stud at one side. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves.
Short lace dress with long lace sleeves and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in textured-knit cotton. Top with an all-over print. Skirt with flounce-trimmed straps.
Shirt in checked flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Star-shaped shoulder bag in glittery imitation leather with a zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 17x17 cm.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.

Soft, non-wired bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Boxer briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Pyjamas in patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Platform trainers with lacing at the front, cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3.5 cm.
Crêpe top with a small stand-up collar, opening at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Fine-knit gloves.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped shirt in a shimmering metallic weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend.
Dungaree shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short dress in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fabric trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Two main compartments with zips at the top, one outer compartment with a zip and an adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size 17x23 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Soft, mixed knit jumper with fringing. Wide, ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and concealed hook and eye at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled to tighten from the sides.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a broderie anglaise yoke, short, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Frill trim over the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Blouse in a fine cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and visible buttons at the top. Smocking with gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and a tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and a slit with a concealed zip at the hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.

Short jacket in woven fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, side pockets with a press-stud, and a drawstring hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in a lustrous weave with a V-neck and wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud. Opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, long cuffed sleeves with a slit running down, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, a back pocket and a print motif on one leg.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Soft cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak at the front and flap at the back to protect both the face and back of the neck. UPF 50.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, pile linings and insoles, and fluted soles.
Long kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back, a wide strap at the back of the neck and open sides.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material.
Thong briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline with narrow elastication at the back, and covered buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication around the shoulders and hems. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, ankle-length, pattern-weave trousers with a high waist, tie belt, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and side pockets.

Trousers in a cotton and silk weave with a regular waist, security button in the waistband and a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and straight, tapered legs with creases.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a checked pattern, small slits at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
